room_title: Escape room "The Diner" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: A few of my math students and I did the diner escape room, and we had a blast! It was a great team building activity and the level of difficulty was perfect. The puzzles were challenging but not at a level of frustration for us. We thoroughly enjoyed the experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Diner" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: My husband and I have done about 100 escape rooms, and this has been one of our favorites. Definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Diner" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: A solid 10/10!!! We just went through The Diner. The puzzles were top-notch and well thought-out. Everyone was super nice too! Looking forward to more! Definitely gonna recommend these rooms to everyone!! :D

room_title: Escape room "The Diner" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: My husband and I did The Diner tonight. We really enjoyed it! It had a really good level of detail, the perfect mix of logic puzzles vs. physical puzzles. The owner is really nice. And we escaped!!
